album.name: Susie leaving
album.description: Susie is leaving Northern-Atlas, Brighton and the UK next weekend, so we decided to celebrate this we'd have an evening out. We started off at our place for drinkies before moving on to The Gingerman. We had a lovely meal there before heading over to Susie's place to drop some stuff off. Our final stop was at the Grand Hotel for cocktails. A very enjoyable evening, and a good send off for Suz.

image.caption: Susie and a plastic cup
image.description: Susie started off drinking out of a lovely elegant glass, but she spilt Cava out of it so many times that we resorted to giving her a more suitable glass. Moral of the story: Susie can't hold her drink!

image.caption: Susie sulks
image.description: Think we were laughing at her having to have a plastic mug

image.caption: Susie
image.description: Now, because she'd spilt so much Cava, she had to use my hairdrier to make herself look more respectable. This was taken whilst she was blowdrying her trousers.

image.caption: Dessert!
image.description: Susie and I shared a most wonderful desert, or rather 5 sample sized raspberry deserts. Yummmm

image.caption: More dessert
image.description: Many of the others had Strawberry Souffle.

image.caption: Carnage
image.description: Not much was left on our plates...

image.caption: Teas
image.description: Whilst we were at Susie's dropping stuff off, she offered us tea or coffee. This is the tea selection, but the coffee selection wasn't to the coffee drinkers liking so we headed off to the Grand.

image.caption: Rich and a video
image.description: Someone at Susie's had a Brighton City of Culture video, and for some reason Rich was posing with it!

image.caption: Petal!
image.description: Kirsty spent all night trying to avoid the camera.
